articles.author: Matt de Neef
articles.title: Gallery: The beauty and brutality of the 2024 Paris-Roubaix - Escape Collective
articles.description: Here's how some of the world's best cycling photographers saw the 'Hell of the North'.
articles.content:
And just like that, the Cobbled Classics are over. This past weekend, the world’s best riders descended on northern France to race in the ‘Hell of the North’, Paris-Roubaix. 
Our wonderful photograp… [+3826 chars]
